Name: Block Statue of Khnum-Ib-Re
Description: The owner of this statue was called Khnum-Ib-Re. It is sculpted in hard stone and polished. Though idealized, the features of the statue include a slight smile. The body of the statue is inscribed with a hieroglyphic text giving the name and titles of Khnum-Ib-Re. It also appeals to people who pass before the statue to recite the offering formula for his sake and not to let his name be forgotten.
